alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:25AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Scott County through 845 AM CDT... At 824 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Heavener Runestone State Park, or 7 miles southeast of Poteau, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beauchamp... Morgan Springs... Oliver... Bates... Cauthron... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County
